title: Beanie Man with Josh Peskowitz
description:
New year, same award-winning podcast. It’s still BIG QUESTIONS ONLY in 2021, which is exactly why this week the boys are dialing in menswear legend Josh Peskowitz. Pesko is tapping in off grid, from the goddamn motherfucking bat cave to consult on his storied professional trajectory, his signature personal style, trend analysis as an OG, tales of old media, retail forays, The Coat Chronicles™, menswear’s best and worst of 2020, reviewing the first annual results of The Fitties and much more on this hotly anticipated, long overdue episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
 
Throwing Fits x Seasons: Use promo code “throwingfits” at checkout or subscribe at http://szns.co/throwingfits
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits
